data.name: How you can use Webflow to build & ship products without code
data.summary:
How Unacademy used Webflow to build a fully functioning year in review webpage for 80,000+ users

What you'll learn at this meetup?
What are NoCode Tools
Webflow for designers, marketers & entrepreneurs: How to bring your idea to life faster without dependency on coders
How Webflow empowers designers to understand the fundamentals of web development
Understanding development constraints & building empathy with your engineering team
Tips on how to make the best out of Webflow
data.speakers: Chethan KVS, Product Designer at Unacademy
